titleStmt.title: A treatise of the Lords supper in two sermons.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: By R. Field for Thomas Man, dwelling in Paternoster row, at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 22705a on UMI microfilm reel 669.
Folger Shakespeare Library copy imperfect; leaves D8 and G4 lacking.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 669 #3 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy; identified as STC 22705a), and at reel 1693 #9 (British Library copy).

place.placeName: Paternoster row, at the signe of the Talbot
